system.description: Connection - Weather Ball.  The user adds the [Blast 3] trait to the triggering attack for the rest of their current activation. Passive: The user's Base Stats increase by 10% per Tier of active [Weather] conditions (max 50%), and the user may treat itself as being under the effect of a number additional [Weather] conditions (for the purposes of its attacks and abilities) equal to the highest Tier [Weather] condition present.
